Room.Name: Tinneya's Quarters
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the private quarters of Tenneya, the weather sorceress.
Room.LongDescription: Long ago she tried to help the Duke of Kayleigh to fight off the powerful witch who invaded this castle, but she was forever turned into a mouse, doomed to run throughout the ruins. It was she who placed the tempest over the castle, in an attempt to put out the flames. Galgorith hunts her.
